weekly.fullText:
Split Lease

Charming 1-Bedroom in Trendy Manhattan - WEEKLY
Entire Place - 2 guests max
Full Kitchen

Description of Lodging

Experience the heart of Manhattan in this inviting one-bedroom apartment, perfectly designed for urban living. With a full kitchen at your disposal, you can whip up culinary delights while enjoying the vibrant energy of the city right outside your door.
